question_zh: SE - A 系列产品的设计用途是什么？
A: 实现水冷式一次变流量冷冻机房的自动控制
B: 实现风冷式一次变流量冷冻机房的自动控制
C: 控制风冷式二次变流量冷冻机房
D: 仅控制风冷式冷冻机的启停
question_en: What is the design purpose of the SE - A series products?
A_EN: Achieve automatic control of water - cooled primary variable - flow chiller plants
B_EN: Achieve automatic control of air - cooled primary variable - flow chiller plants
C_EN: Control air - cooled secondary variable - flow chiller plants
D_EN: Only control the start/stop of air - cooled chillers

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器控制的等大水泵数量（含备用泵）最多为多少台？
question_en: What is the maximum number of equal - sized water pumps (including standby pumps) that the SE - A series controller can control?

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机时，不会考虑以下哪种因素来计算工作冷冻机的最佳台数？
B: 冷冻水温度设定值的差异
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the chillers, which of the following factors is not considered to calculate the optimal number of operating chillers?
B_EN: Difference in chilled water temperature setpoints
C_EN: Water temperature of the cooling tower

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品中，与隔离阀接口相关的操作不包括以下哪项？
A: 利用数字输出打开和关闭阀门
B: 利用数字输入获得阀门启 / 闭状态反馈
C: 自动调节隔离阀的流量大小
D: 根据控制逻辑控制隔离阀的动作
question_en: Which of the following operations is not related to the isolation valve interface in the SE - A series products?
A_EN: Open and close the valve using digital output
B_EN: Obtain the valve open/closed status feedback using digital input
C_EN: Automatically adjust the flow rate of the isolation valve
D_EN: Control the action of the isolation valve according to the control logic

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器在变流量一次泵控制中，若选用 Armstrong DE 泵，泵的启 / 闭控制依据是什么？
B: 根据各泵的最佳效率点计算出最高效的工作泵组合
C: 按照时间顺序依次启动
D: 一台工作冷冻机配一台泵的固定模式
question_en: In the variable - flow primary pump control of the SE - A series controller, if the Armstrong DE pump is selected, what is the basis for controlling the start/stop of the pump?
B_EN: Calculate the most efficient combination of operating pumps based on the best efficiency points of each pump
C_EN: Start in sequence according to time
D_EN: A fixed mode of one operating chiller with one pump

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器在调节旁通阀时的主要目的是什么？
C: 调节流量使其保持恒定
D: 根据温度变化调节流量
question_en: What is the main purpose of the SE - A series controller when adjusting the bypass valve?
C_EN: Adjust the flow rate to keep it constant
D_EN: Adjust the flow rate according to temperature changes

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品的主要控制逻辑中，不包括以下哪项？
A: 基于需求大小控制冷冻机台数
B: 仅根据时间控制水泵转速
C: 对区域信号实施持续监控
question_en: Which of the following is not included in the main control logic of the SE - A series products?
A_EN: Control the number of chillers based on demand
B_EN: Control the pump speed only according to time
D_EN: Adjust the bypass valve to maintain the flow rate

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机顺序时，以下哪个不是考虑因素？
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the chiller sequence, which of the following is not a consideration?
B_EN: High - flow state of the chiller

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制变流量一次泵的泵速时，在配有区域传感器的条件下，依据什么信号决定泵的工作转速？
A: 仅区域温度传感器信号
B: 仅区域差压传感器信号
C: 区域差压传感器或区域温度传感器的信号
D: 机房总压力传感器信号
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the pump speed of variable - flow primary pumps and are equipped with regional sensors, what signal is used to determine the operating speed of the pump?
A_EN: Only the signal from the regional temperature sensor
B_EN: Only the signal from the regional differential pressure sensor
C_EN: The signal from the regional differential pressure sensor or the regional temperature sensor
D_EN: The signal from the total pressure sensor in the plant

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品适用于以下哪种系统？
C: 舒适或者工艺制冷系统
question_en: Which of the following systems is the SE - A series products applicable to?

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机流量时，通过什么方式将其维持在设定范围内？
question_en: How does the SE - A series products maintain the chiller flow rate within the set range?
A_EN: Only adjust the start/stop of the pump
C_EN: Adjust the start/stop and speed of the pump

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机房设备时，对于不同品牌的冷冻机如何进行通信控制？
B: 通过预先列出的 Modbus/BACnet/Lonworks 协议映射实现通信
C: 只能使用特定品牌的协议
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the equipment in the chiller plant, how do they communicate and control chillers of different brands?
B_EN: Achieve communication through pre - listed Modbus/BACnet/Lonworks protocol mapping
C_EN: Can only use the protocols of specific brands

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品相比传统产品，在节能方面的优势主要体现在哪里？
B: 优化控制逻辑，降低设备运行能耗
question_en: Compared with traditional products, where does the energy - saving advantage of the SE - A series products mainly lie?
B_EN: Optimize the control logic to reduce equipment operation energy consumption

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在安装阶段的优势不包括以下哪项？
question_en: Which of the following is not an advantage of the SE - A series products during the installation stage?

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在运维阶段，相对于手动控制机房，能降低多少运营风险？
question_en: During the operation and maintenance stage, compared with manually controlled chiller plants, how much can the SE - A series products reduce the operation risk?

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在现有可变一次流量冷冻机房中，安装后的投资回报期通常是多久？
question_en: In the existing variable primary - flow chiller plants, what is the typical payback period of the SE - A series products after installation?

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在提升设备可靠性方面的作用主要体现在哪里？
B: 优化控制逻辑，减少设备故障
question_en: Where does the role of the SE - A series products in enhancing equipment reliability mainly lie?
B_EN: Optimize the control logic to reduce equipment failures

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在兼容楼宇管理系统方面，主要通过什么实现最佳效率分级？
A: 机房能效分析和不同设备实时前馈控制
question_en: In terms of being compatible with building management systems, how does the SE - A series products achieve the best efficiency classification?
A_EN: Plant energy efficiency analysis and real - time feed - forward control of different devices
B_EN: Increase the functions of the management system

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在调试阶段的优势不包括以下哪项？
question_en: Which of the following is not an advantage of the SE - A series products during the commissioning stage?
B_EN: Achieve transparent operation of the chiller plant

question_zh: 以下哪个控制产品没有热平衡界面？
question_en: Which of the following control products does not have a heat balance interface?

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品的特点包括（ ）
C: 仅能独立运行，不能与 BAS 互补运行
D: 基于远程访问功能提供支持和故障排除
question_en: The characteristics of the SE - A series products include ()
C_EN: Can only operate independently and cannot operate complementarily with BAS
D_EN: Provide support and troubleshooting based on remote access function

question_zh: 3 台风冷冷水主机的机房可以选用以下哪些控制产品？
question_en: Which control products can be selected for a chiller plant with 3 air - cooled water chillers?

question_zh: EE-A 系统不能用于控制什么类型的制冷系统？
question_en: What types of refrigeration systems cannot be controlled by the EE - A system?

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器在控制冷冻机时，会考虑以下哪些因素来计算工作冷冻机的最佳台数？
B: 冷冻水温度设定值的差异
question_en: When the SE - A series controller controls the chillers, which of the following factors are considered to calculate the optimal number of operating chillers?
B_EN: Difference in chilled water temperature setpoints
D_EN: High - flow state of the chiller

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品中，与隔离阀接口相关的操作有（ ）
A: 利用数字输出打开和关闭阀门
B: 利用数字输入获得阀门启 / 闭状态反馈
C: 调节隔离阀的流量大小
D: 根据控制逻辑控制隔离阀的动作
question_en: The operations related to the isolation valve interface in the SE - A series products include ()
A_EN: Open and close the valve using digital output
B_EN: Obtain the valve open/closed status feedback using digital input
C_EN: Adjust the flow rate of the isolation valve
D_EN: Control the action of the isolation valve according to the control logic

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器在变流量一次泵控制方面的特点包括（ ）
A: 若选用 Armstrong DE 泵，根据各泵的最佳效率点计算工作泵组合
B: 依据一台工作冷冻机配一台泵的模式（非 DE 泵时）
C: 配有区域传感器时，依据区域差压或温度传感器信号决定泵速
D: 通过调节维持冷冻机流量在设定范围内
question_en: The characteristics of the SE - A series controller in variable - flow primary pump control include ()
A_EN: If the Armstrong DE pump is selected, calculate the operating pump combination based on the best efficiency points of each pump
B_EN: Based on the mode of one operating chiller with one pump (when not using the DE pump)
C_EN: When equipped with regional sensors, determine the pump speed based on the signals of regional differential pressure or temperature sensors
D_EN: Maintain the chiller flow rate within the set range through adjustment

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器的主要控制逻辑涉及（ ）
A: 基于需求大小控制冷冻机台数
D: 区域信号监控与旁通阀调节
question_en: The main control logic of the SE - A series controller involves ()
A_EN: Control the number of chillers based on demand
D_EN: Regional signal monitoring and bypass valve adjustment

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品可应用于以下哪些场景？
question_en: The SE - A series products can be applied to which of the following scenarios?
A_EN: Air - conditioning systems in commercial buildings
D_EN: Heat - dissipation systems in data centers

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机流量时，采用的方法包括（ ）
question_en: The methods used by the SE - A series products in the process of controlling the chiller flow rate include ()
A_EN: Adjust the start/stop of the pump
C_EN: Control the opening and closing of the isolation valve
D_EN: Adjust the power of the chiller

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在一次泵变流量系统中，泵的启动模式有（ ）
A: 选用 Armstrong DE 泵时依据最佳效率点计算启动
B: 非 DE 泵时一台工作冷冻机配一台泵启动
question_en: In the primary pump variable - flow system of the SE - A series products, what are the start - up modes of the pumps?
A_EN: When the Armstrong DE pump is selected, start based on the calculation of the best efficiency points
B_EN: When not using the DE pump, start with one operating chiller with one pump
D_EN: Start according to the pressure situation

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制区域信号方面的作用包括（ ）
D: 为设备控制提供参考依据
question_en: The functions of the SE - A series products in controlling regional signals include ()
D_EN: Provide a reference basis for equipment control

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品相比传统产品，在节能方面的优势体现在以下哪些方面？
A: 采用并联无传感器控制技术
B: 优化控制策略，降低设备运行能耗
C: 减少不必要的设备运行时间
D: 提高设备的能源转换效率
question_en: Compared with traditional products, the energy - saving advantages of the SE - A series products are reflected in which of the following aspects?
A_EN: Adopt parallel sensor - less control technology
B_EN: Optimize the control strategy to reduce equipment operation energy consumption
D_EN: Improve the energy conversion efficiency of equipment

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在安装阶段的优势有（ ）
question_en: The advantages of the SE - A series products during the installation stage include ()

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在运维阶段的优势包括（ ）
A: 可远程访问进行故障排查
B: 直接获得工厂技术支持
C: 减少人工现场运维工作量
question_en: The advantages of the SE - A series products during the operation and maintenance stage include ()
B_EN: Direct access to factory technical support
C_EN: Reduce manual on - site operation and maintenance workload

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在降低系统成本方面的综合方法有（ ）
A: 采用高效的控制技术提高能效
B: 优化设备冗余配置，降低设备采购成本
question_en: The comprehensive methods for the SE - A series products to reduce system costs include ()
A_EN: Adopt efficient control technology to improve energy efficiency
B_EN: Optimize equipment redundancy configuration to reduce equipment procurement costs

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在兼容楼宇管理系统方面的作用有（ ）
question_en: The functions of the SE - A series products in being compatible with building management systems include ()

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在调试阶段的优势体现为（ ）
question_en: The advantages of the SE - A series products during the commissioning stage are reflected in ()
B_EN: Achieve transparent operation of the chiller plant

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在确保设备和系统运行符合设计意图方面的方式有（ ）
D: 按照标准操作流程运行
question_en: The ways for the SE - A series products to ensure that the equipment and system operation meet the design intent include ()
D_EN: Operate in accordance with the standard operating procedures

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在满足各种应用要求方面的特点包括（ ）
C: 具备高可靠性和稳定性
question_en: The characteristics of the SE - A series products in meeting various application requirements include ()

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在投资回报方面的优势有（ ）
B: 能有效降低运营成本，提高回报
C: 可通过节能等方式增加收益
D: 设备使用寿命延长，减少更换成本
question_en: The advantages of the SE - A series products in terms of return on investment include ()
B_EN: Effectively reduce operating costs and improve returns
C_EN: Increase revenue through energy - saving and other means
D_EN: Prolong the equipment service life and reduce replacement costs

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品只能用于风冷式二次变流量冷冻机房控制。（ ）
question_en: The SE - A series products can only be used for the control of air - cooled secondary variable - flow chiller plants. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器控制的等大水泵数量（含备用泵）可超过 5 台，超过 5 台申请 NCP 即可。（ ）
question_en: The number of equal - sized water pumps (including standby pumps) controlled by the SE - A series controller can exceed 5. An application for NCP is required when it exceeds 5. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 10 系列标准控制器控制的等大水泵数量（含备用泵）最多 3 台。（ ）
question_en: The maximum number of equal - sized water pumps (including standby pumps) that the SE - A 10 series standard controller can control is 3. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 20 系列标准控制器控制的等大水泵数量（含备用泵）最多 5 台。（ ）
question_en: The maximum number of equal - sized water pumps (including standby pumps) that the SE - A 20 series standard controller can control is 5. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品只能用于风冷式二次变流量冷冻机房控制。（ ）
question_en: The SE - A series products can only be used for the control of air - cooled secondary variable - flow chiller plants. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机时，不会考虑冷冻机高流量状态。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the chillers, they do not consider the high - flow state of the chillers. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品中，隔离阀只能手动控制其开关。（ ）
question_en: In the SE - A series products, the isolation valve can only be controlled manually to open and close. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器调节旁通阀是为了维持最高流量水平。（ ）
question_en: The SE - A series controller adjusts the bypass valve to maintain the highest flow level. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品的主要控制逻辑不包括区域信号监控。（ ）
question_en: The main control logic of the SE - A series products does not include regional signal monitoring. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机顺序时，只依据机房负荷。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the chiller sequence, they only rely on the plant load. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列控制器与外部 BMS 设备通信仅支持 Modbus 协议。（ ）
question_en: The SE - A series controller only supports the Modbus protocol for communication with external BMS devices. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制变流量一次泵的泵速时，有且仅有一种控制依据。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the pump speed of variable - flow primary pumps, there is only one control basis. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品不适用于工艺制冷系统。（ ）
question_en: The SE - A series products are not applicable to process cooling systems. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制大小主机运行时，可以随意同时开启。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the operation of large and small main units, they can be turned on simultaneously at will. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机流量时，不需要调节泵速。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the chiller flow rate, there is no need to adjust the pump speed. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制风冷式冷冻机时，主要调节的参数是冷冻机的功率。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control air - cooled chillers, the main parameter to be adjusted is the power of the chiller. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在一次泵变流量系统中，所有泵都是同时启动的。（ ）
question_en: In the primary pump variable - flow system of the SE - A series products, all pumps start simultaneously. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制区域信号时，对设备控制没有作用。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control regional signals, it has no effect on equipment control. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在控制冷冻机房设备时，对于不同品牌的冷冻机无法进行通信控制。（ ）
question_en: When the SE - A series products control the equipment in the chiller plant, they cannot communicate and control chillers of different brands. ( )

question_zh: SE - A 系列产品在运维阶段，不能远程访问进行故障排查。（ ）
question_en: During the operation and maintenance stage, the SE - A series products cannot be remotely accessed for troubleshooting. ( )

question_zh: 以下五台风冷冷水主机的系统应该选用哪款控制产品，并需配置几个温度传感器？
question_en: Which control product should be selected for a system with five air - cooled water chillers, and how many temperature sensors need to be configured?
